|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-MT3000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (Beryl AX) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/12/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/GL.iNet_GL-MT3000_(Beryl_AX) |wlclass = AX3000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = travel router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-MT3000 |icid = 23019-MT3000 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7981BA;(Filogic 820) |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX35LF2GE4AD-Z41; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5AD256M16E4-JR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = MaxLinear;GPY211;MXL, GPY211C0VC, SLNW8; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- autp --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:83:C4 |oui = 94:83:C4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2022.07-rc3 |stockos = Linux;5.4.211;OpenWrt 21.02-SNAPSHOT
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C) Female
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, heat sink |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = GL-MT3000-XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^GL-MT3000-[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|fccapprovdate = 01/19/2023 |estreldate = 12/2022 |estprice = 99 |upc = 6971131383086 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAP8BK669665 |asin = B0BPSGJN7T |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = MediaTek;MT7976CN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7976CN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 2402 |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MT3000-V1.2" and "2023/03/08" are silk-screened on board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7981BA @1.3GHz (''Filogic 820'') :SoC: Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 256MB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: 512MB (DDR4) RAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Wi-Fi: [[MediaTek]] MT7981BA/MT7976CN :802.11abgn/ac/ax Dual Band (2.4/5GHz) :2×2 2.4GHz + 3×3 (2×2 + Zero-wait DFS) 5GHz *Network: 1x 2.5GbE (WAN), 1x 1GbE (LAN) ports *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://store-us.gl-inet.com/products/beryl-ax-gl-mt3000-pocket-sized-wi-fi-6-wireless-travel-gigabit-router Official shop] *[https://docs.gl-inet.com/router/en/4/user_guide/gl-mt3000/ Docs] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official forum] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/gl-mt3000 OpenWrt Device Page]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/01/08/gl-inet-gl-mt3000-wifi-6-router-review-specs-unboxing-teardown/ ''GL.iNet GL-MT3000 pocket-sized Wi-Fi 6 Router review'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://the-gadgeteer.com/2023/02/14/gl-inet-beryl-ax-gl-mt3000-travel-router-review-stay-cyber-safe-with-this-powerful-device/ ''GL-iNET Beryl AX GL-MT3000 Travel Router review'' on '''The Gadgeteer''']
